translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "While having my breasts fondled lying down,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 器用に体を洗ってやがる……」
「寝たままこれだけ行動できるなら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If she can act this much while lying down...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の上にまたがって腰を動かしたりも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: riding on top of me and moving her hips too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おお……ぐふふ、素晴らしい……」
「いや、そういうことはしない」
落ち着かないというか油断ならん奴め……」
一割の優しさと五割のぼんやりと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are made up of 10% kindness, 50% absentmindedness,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 四割の油断ならなさで出来……てる……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That... was said by... who was it again...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怪我人の手当なら任せな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leave treating the wounded to me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中庭にはプリマがいた。
「……君達はいつまで経っても俺を隊長と呼ぶな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You all keep calling me Captain no matter how much time passes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「君達ってアイスフレームのメンバー？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you members of the Ice Frame?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕方ないだろ、当時あんたは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can't be helped, back then you were

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あたしらの隊長だったんだから」
中庭の隅には的が備え付けられ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the corner of the courtyard, a target was set up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プリマは鞭を持った手を深く沈めながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Prima, holding a whip, deeply lowered her hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを睨みつけていた。
プリマは沈めていた手を円を描くように振り上げ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prima raised her lowered hand in a circular motion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鞭の先端で的を見事に叩き落として見せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and skillfully struck the target with the tip of her whip, knocking it down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あたしの仕事は救護だけどさ、
少しくらいは戦闘が出来た方がいいだろう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's better if I can fight a little, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「鞭、振るうなんて久し振りだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's been a while since I wielded a whip,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場で、もしもの時は後悔したくないしね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't want to regret it in case something happens on the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来ることはなんでもしたいのさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to do whatever I can."
"Hmm, is it your first fight in a long time?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冒険者なんてヤクザな仕事は辞めて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I quit the gangster-like job of being an adventurer,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 以前は貿易会社でOLしてたよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and used to work as an office lady at a trading company."
"But it went bankrupt because of the war."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しばらくは戦災救助のボランティア団体にいて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For a while, I was with a war disaster relief volunteer group,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今はここに拾われて戦うことになった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and now I've been taken in here to fight.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
